title: Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 4: Remco Evenepoel Wallops GC Rivals with Huge Time Trial Victory
content:
'To be on this form already is a good sign for the Tour:' Evenepoel puts time into all his rivals in ITT, Roglič moves to second overall, 33 seconds back.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 4: Remco Evenepoel Wallops GC Rivals with Huge Time Trial Victory on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
